Title: All Quiet on the Western Front
Writer: Erich Maria Remarque (by), Maxwell Anderson (adaptation), George Abbott (screen play), Del Andrews (adaptation), C. Gardner Sullivan (supervising story chief)
Actors: Louis Wolheim, Lew Ayres, John Wray, Arnold Lucy
Plot: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.
